channel.title: Comments on: How the Name Picker Works

item.title: By: Jack Ratcliff
item.dc:creator: Jack Ratcliff
item.description: <p>Great job on this! I have done something very similar to this in my Domino Web Tools project on OpenNTF.org. </p><p>Also, using Ajax techniques, I just added the ability to expand multiple categories in a single category view. You can take a look here to see it in action: <a href="<a rel="nofollow" href="http://jackratcliff.com/jratcliff/dwt/dwt-demo.nsf/sc1?OpenView"" rel="nofollow ugc">http://jackratcliff.com/jratcliff/dwt/dwt-demo.nsf/sc1?OpenView"</a>><a href="http://jackratcliff.com/jratcliff/dwt/dwt-demo.nsf/sc1?OpenView" rel="nofollow ugc">http://jackratcliff.com/jratcliff/dwt/dwt-demo.nsf/sc1?OpenView</a></a></p><p>Jack</p>
item.content:encoded:
Great job on this! I have done something very similar to this in my Domino Web Tools project on OpenNTF.org.

Also, using Ajax techniques, I just added the ability to expand multiple categories in a single category view. You can take a look here to see it in action: http://jackratcliff.com/jratcliff/dwt/dwt-demo.nsf/sc1?OpenView“>http://jackratcliff.com/jratcliff/dwt/dwt-demo.nsf/sc1?OpenView

Jack
